title: Frmr. White House Speechwriter Cody Keenan (Extended Cut)
description:
Stephen welcomes former White House speechwriter Cody Keenan for a chat about his time writing for President Obama, and learns the “dirty little secret” of how he earned his nickname. Cody’s new book, “Grace: President Obama and Ten Days in the Battle for America,” is available now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
